products.title: Leyton Pale Pink Roman Blind
products.description: This beautiful leyton pale pink roman blind shows just how well pink tones can work in a simple, classy scheme. The shade is subtle and subdued, delicate almost, which is perfect for maintaining a neutral vibe. Pair with similarly subdued blue shades for a complementary look, this beautiful leyton pale pink roman blind shows just how well pink tones can work in a simple, classy scheme.

Vibrant green is interwoven with golden earth tones for a finish thats subdued but rich with natural colour. Combine with c bring nature into your home with the leyton pool green roman blind, an organic and uplifting window dressing that will cheer up any space in an instant.

products.title: Leyton Royal Purple Roman Blind

products.title: Leyton Golden Yellow Roman Blind

products.title: Leyton Deep Navy Roman Blind
products.description: Dark, bold and refined, this leyton deep navy roman blind combines a soft, natural feel with stately chic to great effect. The hue is a classic choice for bringing colour into a space without overwhelming its surroundings, muted and heavy, great for harmonising with deep grey dark, bold and refined, this leyton deep navy roman blind combines a soft, natural feel with stately chic to great effect.

products.title: Leyton Winter Grass Roman Blind
products.description: Fresh, cool and clean, this stunning roman blind is - despite its name - the perfect antidote to the winter blues. The minty fresh colour of the fabric makes it super bright and uplifting, making any space feel more light and airy in an instant.
